name: Digers!
tagline: Agile Web&Mobile Apps Development - The Right Way
description:
We're Digers - a web/mobile software development house working the agile way.
A team of 20+ experienced (5-10 years) developers, project managers/certified scrum masters and designers focusing on challenging web & mobile projects.
Solving problems of mobile/web development - designing and developing scalable, complex web-apps for remote, Europe and US-based clients from finance, media, advertising sectors.
Key focus:
- product research, design and development
- mobile app design and development
- web-app design and development
- quality assurance
